PHRASE.LANG: Awarded for supplying gunners who are successful in Phase 2 of the Killzone® event in the ISA fight against Helghast oppression. [#Legal]
Récompense pour avoir soutenu les tireurs et remporté la phase 2 de l'épreuve Killzone®, dans le combat de l'ISA contre l'oppression helghaste. [#Legal]
Wird für die Versorgung von Schützen vergeben, die in Welle 2 des Killzone®-Events im Kampf der ISA gegen die Unterdrückung durch Helghast erfolgreich sind. [#Legal]
Assegnati per aver rifornito gli artiglieri vincenti nella fase 2 dell'evento Killzone® nella lotta degli ISA contro l'oppressione degli Helghast. [#Legal]
Otorgados por proveer de suministros a los artilleros que tuvieron éxito en la 2.ª oleada del evento Killzone® en la lucha de la ISA contra la opresión Helghast. [#Legal]
Awarded for supplying gunners who are successful in Phase 2 of the Killzone® event in the ISA fight against Helghast oppression. [#Legal]
Awarded for supplying gunners who are successful in Phase 2 of the Killzone® event in the ISA fight against Helghast oppression. [#Legal]
